title: OnePlus doubles down on the affordable 5G smartphone segment with the new Nord N20 5G
content:
Last November, we got our first look at an upcoming affordable 5G smartphone from OnePlus called the Nord N20 5G. OnePlus officially confirmed the device’s existence earlier this month and announced that it would soon make its way to North American markets. As promised, the company has now launched the OnePlus Nord N20 5G in

The post OnePlus doubles down on the affordable 5G smartphone segment with the new Nord N20 5G appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus is betting big on the affordable 5G smartphone segment with the new OnePlus Nord N20 5G. Read on to learn more about the device.
